This game is great (I haven't finished it yet.) It was even better than the first one, and I LOVED the first one. I like the references to the first game and the game-play is amazing. The puzzles are sometimes tricky, but I usually get over them.  The story/plot line is great and the graphics are better. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who loves platforming, action & adventure, and puzzle solving games. 10 - 10 would play again.

Fajnie wracaj do klasyka i to na steam, gra nie jest bardzo długa ale 1 roździał trwa około 30 minut a jest ich 12 + 1 dodatkowy czyli napisy , Gra ma w miare fajne zakończenie lecz brakowało mi możliwości zabicia tego złego dowódce który był w tej OGROMNEJ WIEŻY, Ostatnie roździały są najlepsze i jeżdzenie autami , poduszkowcami jest średnie ponieważ dziwnie skręcają jak chce w lewo to skręca w prawo ale to jest czasem , TAKŻE ,,TAK'' gra jest dobra nawet dzisiaj ale 1 część the best :-).

U've to stop combine invasion, but it's a simple mission, because u're Dr. Freeman, the chosen one!
The protagonist is fully of charisma, where do you go NPC starts following you.
It's a linear game, you must go from place  A to λ, with alot of stuff on u'r way.
Game mechanics are grat, source engine still great although it's a 2004 game.

I really recommend play this game, promo makes cost 2 BRL only :)

I recommend this game as it is by far the best game anyone can lay their hands on! With a more recent update the lighting in Nova Prospekt and the tunnels is definitely better for our current standards and Half Life 2 is so unique in not just the story but the gameplay as you are placed into the shoes of Gordon Freeman and you are woken up by the G-Man and you then have to go through various areas which transition so smoothly it is like it is real, which is how it became 2004's best game. This game deserves expansions like HL1 where you can play as the Rebels or one where you play as the Combine, the same way Blue Shift made you a security guard, Barney, and Opposing Force where you play as the HECU Marines. I enjoyed the walkthrough I had, which is not on youtube because I don't have a youtube channel. I had fun messing about in Nova Prospekt with the Antlions and literally obliterating all the Combine Soldiers, and I recommend it for sure!

[h1] 传奇也会老去 [/h1]
        谁又曾想过FPS曾经是纯粹的代名词？拿上你的BFG，杀光你眼前的所有敌人过去是FPS的一切。例如大名鼎鼎的id software的德军总部3D，DOOM，雷神之锤，我不否认这些FPS的优秀，但它们给我的震撼却远不如半条命和网络奇兵。
    
    id差点就给FPS定了型，就如同西木给RTS定型一样。幸好，是差一点，多亏了我们的irrational games以及V社，FPS得以另辟蹊径。也许在你脚底下搭个箱子垫高去够一个通风口这种设计在如今看来很低能，但在98年的一款FPS里这却是脍炙人口的想法。半条命的出现终结了以id为代表的无脑突突突FPS的时代，它向世人宣告了FPS不是一个无脑的游戏类型，它也可以讲好一个引人入胜的故事。而在2004年，V社又把一个充满魔幻现实主义的半条命2展现在世人面前，无论是艺术设计，关卡设计，叙事手法都堪称业界典范，甚至是超前。半条命2的艺术设计至今令我难以忘却，从火车站徐徐走出，熟悉的高楼，明媚的阳光，但街上的行人却是全副武装的国民护卫队和三角机甲，目光远眺，一座巨大的城堡耸立在城市的中心，让人倍感压抑，与其他科幻题材不同的地方是，半条命2别出心裁地描绘了一幅人类被霸道的外星文明----联合军所奴役的场景，并且有相当多的合理又严谨的细节，例如联合军出色的反渗透手段，生物兵器等。在游戏设计方面也有重力枪这些现在看来也很新鲜有趣的东西；另外本作在多样化上面更上一层楼，玩家需要操控功能各异的载具，穿过下水道，海滩，漆黑的小镇，工业区等完全不同的场景。可以说，半条命2在设计上面是相当超前的。

但就像我标题所说的，传奇也会老去，crytek还在试图拯救半死不活的猎杀对决，b社正在阿帕拉契亚的严冬中煎熬，暴雪的遗言是一句：你们难道没有手机吗？而V社的悲歌却是戈登式的沉默。是的，沉默。半条命20周年之际，V社甚至一点表示都没有，也许他们去完善A牌了吧，但A牌的结果却是一个游戏设计与玩家需求脱节的产品。记得去年美国的一个半条命粉丝专门拍摄了一部半条命20周年的纪录片，里面有段采访让我印象深刻，大致对话是这样的：Q：你还想玩到半条命3吗？A：其实已经不想了，因为我已经玩到了。

泰坦陨落2，掠食，生化奇兵，耻辱，等等等等，其实这些就是我们的“半条命3”，半条命不仅仅是个游戏，更是一个新方向，一个开始，一颗FPS+多样化+叙事性的种子，也许我这辈子也玩不到半条命的任何一款正统续作，也许这个传奇已经落幕，但总有人会去走那条它走过的道路，直到有一天超过它。

[h1]Геймплей и сюжет.[/h1]
Простенький такой шутер 2003 года, который хочется перепроходить раз за разом. Быстрая и динамичная стрелялка с сюжетом и научной фантастикой. Сюжет вполне интересный и затягивающий.
[h1]Графика и атмосфера.[/h1]
Графика...  Хоть я в какой-то степени придирчив к графике, тут не прикопаться, она шикарна. К слову о графике: Есть ремейк FakeFactory: Cinematic Mod, он не идеален (в плане геймплея и некоторых ошибок на картах), но внешне игра становится очень красивая и приятно смотреть на это. Соурс сделал своё дело. Атмосфера и звуки игры не менее шикарны, чем сама графика. Напоминает Россию.
[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Меня игра затянула вот уже на 90 часов, и это только начало. Однозначно рекомендую этот шедевр.
[i]я опять слышу чёрную кошку.........[/i]
[i]однажды я нашёл Rule 34 со страйдерами и в голове раздался щелчёк дробовика....[/i]

Play the original instead. Yes, it was clunky, but way better than this one.

Combat is tedious. Maybe it was great in 2004, but if you like combat, play Max Payne or something else.

Story: was there any? Ah yes, Gordon Freeman a scientist who blows things up like Rambo and gets blown up. And there was the Combine and the rebels and alines. At least Master Chief in Halo was the head honcho of combat, but why the hell is Gordon Freeman the last hope of humanity? Because he has a PhD? At least in HL1 he had motivation, escape Black Mesa. 

Alyx bosses the player around, and the player does it without question. That is good for a an average shooting game without story, but not reason for overwhelming praise for HL2. Other shooters do things better.  

Wait...what? Ahhh, story.... I guess the Gravity Gun was the core of the story.

AI companions deserve to be shot, no, rally, they are burden.  

Scripted situations just to make the game hard for hard sake. 

Looooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooong driving sequences, which are clunky. 

Perhaps I do not like it, since I did not pick it up when it came out, and nostaligia did not creep in. And admitedly, I have nostalgia for the original.

I mean, what can you say about a game considered by many to be the greatest of all time?! It's easily in my top 3, if not number 1. I just played it through, again, FIFTEEN YEARS after its release and it still blows me away how much attention to detail there is and, overall, how much fun it is to play. The creators of this game must have had a true vision for excitement. How to combine player movements, gunfights, map development, and music to climax at the exact perfect time to deliver a truly incredible player experience. Many parts of this game are true works of art. PC games have come SO FAR in the past 15 years.... and yet Half-Life 2 still hangs with them. How is that even possible?! Valve, I know you're tired of hearing it. But you're doing your fans a disservice by not making a modern Half-Life 3 follow-up. This is like making 2 seasons of Game of Thrones and then just quitting. lol

Half-Life byla nadčasová hra v té době a to se podařilo i u Half-Life 2. Grafika mi přijde furt dobrá na tuto dobu prakticky této hře nemůžu nic vytknout je to úžasná hra. Zanechala u mě spoustu vzpomínek a nezapomenutelných postav. Hra má velice dobrý soundtrack, příběh i lore jsem rád že taková to hra mohla vzniknout a dodnes se hraje. Řekl bych že kdo nehrál jakýkoliv Half-Life není opravdovým hráčem.

Hodnocení 10/10

This game has to be one of, if not, the best game I've ever played. It perfectly integrates combat, the aiming is amazing, and the weapons definitely vary, with different effects, alternates, and act exactly how you would think. The vehicles control perfectly, controls are tight and precise, great speed for all of them, and the airboat works perfectly on water (yes, I know it was made for the water, but it works amazing on a non-solid surface). The game also perfectly adds puzzles into the mix, having them obvious, yet puzzling, and clever and amazing uses of the prop physics and hitbox. The Gravity Gun is a weapon used to move objects that are to big and/or heavy for Gordon. It utilizes the physics of the objects amazingly. It also has a offensive move when you left-click. If you are holding an object with the Grav Gun, when you left-click, it blasts the object away from you, doing higher damage, but shorter range with bigger objects. I haven't brought up the story, but I won't for spoiler reasons and I'd be here for hours.
